name: .DIP File Extension
summary: Learn about .DIP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A DIP file contains a printed circuit board (PCB) created by DipTrace, a schematic and PCB design program. It stores a PCB layout, which includes one or more layers of electrical wires, central processors, conductive tracks, and other electrical component connections.

content: The DIP file is the main file type associated with the PCB Layout Editor. The module allows you to design the layout of your PCB then save it in the DIP file. When you finish designing your PCB layout and verify that it is valid, you can order it through DipTrace. To do this, select File → Order PCB → Place Order are used for printing the physical PCB.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .dip file in Novarm DipTrace 3
images.caption: DIP file open in Novarm DipTrace 3
